main event: A civilian observed a cigar-shaped object in Laredo, Texas, in January 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a star and exhibited blue and red flashing lights., The object was visible for about twenty minutes before disappearing., The report indicated that the object was not any known aircraft., The object moved in a straight line and was observed by a single civilian witness., The witness's reliability was noted as poor due to a previous similar report.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object with flashing blue and red lights
